title: Ep. 947 - A Stand Against Puppy Killers And Racists
description:
The Canadian government threatens to kill truckers’ puppies, Ted Cruz introduces legislation to defund schools that make kids get the Fauci Ouchie, and NYC mayor Eric Adams threatens to stop taking questions from white reporters.
Check out my shop page to purchase shirts, stickers, and books (one with words, one without) https://utm.io/uedo1
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Subscribe to The Daily Wire and stream our newest movie SHUT IN, already with a 97% audience score on Rotten Tomatoes: https://utm.io/uehf3
